suggestions.title: Compare technologies
suggestions.prompt: What are the key differences between using Kubernetes and Docker Swarm for container orchestration in a production environment?

suggestions.title: Check approved versions
suggestions.prompt: What is the currently approved version of Node.js for new backend services, and are there any migration plans for older services?

suggestions.title: Find best practices
suggestions.prompt: What are the Ameritas best practices for securing a public-facing API built with .NET Core?

suggestions.title: Ask about a process
suggestions.prompt: Can you outline the process for requesting a new software license for a development team?
